text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Sudanese president's envoy to President Saddam Hussein arrives in Baghdad.
- Iraqi trade delegation arrives in Damascus.
- A delegation from Iraqi journalists union leaves for Damascus.
- Egypt's President Hosni Mubarak will not take part in an Islamic conference in Turkey in protest against Ankara's invasion of northern Iraq.
- Turkish army turns into a political party in Turkey.
(The above were also carried by JUMHOURIYA and AL-IRAQ)
- Editorial says U.S. cannot stop the growing pressure from world countries to have sanctions on Iraq lifted.
